>
[Drake Rifle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1166)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 154</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _drake rifle_ is a firearm made from the saliva glands of a [drake](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=36). The firearm launches small bursts of empowered spittle instead of typical rounds of ammunition. A drake rifle is a _+1 weapon_. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals 1d10 damage with a range increment of 150 feet and [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254). It deals acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage, depending on the drake from which it was made. On a critical hit, the spittle clings to the target and they take [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) of the same type as the weapon equal to 1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice. A drake rifle does not add critical specialization effects.

<document level="2" id="action-955" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the saliva glands of a ritually hunted drake with a breath weapon that deals the appropriate damage type for the _drake rifle_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
